articles.author: Macer Hall
articles.description: SIR Keir Starmer's attempt to move Labour on from Brexit has been hit after a poll revealed nearly 60 percent of members want to rejoin the European Union.
articles.title: Labour's Brexit nightmare: Starmer crisis as members demand UK rejoin EU - Daily Express

articles.description: Up to 75 per cent of cases in continental Europe are now the more contagious variant.
articles.title: Covid-19 coronavirus: Highly contagious mutations hit Europe - New Zealand Herald

articles.content: Struggling tour operator Air Transat is in talks with the federal government on aid but may not reach a deal by an April debt deadline, a source close to the situation said, putting pressure on Quebe… [+4826 chars]
articles.description: Air Canada dropped its merger plans with Transat on Friday, saying European regulators had signaled it was unlikely to pass antitrust concerns.
articles.title: Air Transat seeks help from feds after failed takeover as debt deadline looms - Global News

articles.author: AFP
articles.content:
THE UKS MEDICAL regulator has said that seven people out of 30 people who suffered blood clots after receiving the Oxford-AstraZeneca vaccine have died.
Details of the deaths come as several Europea… [+2862 chars]
articles.description: Several European countries have paused the use of the jab.
articles.title: UK releases new data about AstraZeneca-linked blood clots as EMA continues to support use of vaccine - TheJournal.ie
